nodes.text: Wharlithan horns were a type of musical instrument made from the horn of a wharlithan. The instruments were made by members of the Lanai species on their homeworld of Ahch-To, and the Lanais who inhabited the Caretaker village of the temple island there owned one.

A wharlithan horn was created to be a part of the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi; however, the scene it appeared in was ultimately cut before the final release. Despite this, the instrument still appeared in Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released alongside the film on December 15, 2017.
